documents.document: Today’s post is about my entry for the photographic challenge. This time the topic is toys, which I love, so I went crazy and took over 200 pictures. Therefore, it was really hard to pick just one so I decided to create a collage and named “The real reason of why Barbie never married Ken”. [...]

To celebrate their anniversary of the facebook group called the “Familia Fotera” (Photographic Family), the owners decided to pick the same theme that started it all a year ago: self-portrait!   I wasn’t sure what to do so the picture is not really too creative. However, a few days ago my boyfriend and I were [...]

I love flowers. I always have but recently I found myself eager to learn about their care and trying to built me a small garden (in my balcony). The result is pretty decent so far, but it still needs so work.   I got this beautiful arrangement from my “foster parents” for my birthday. It’s [...]

Sometimes I wish I could just fly away to the moon or beyond, even if just for a moment, and don’t have to worry about anything at all. Dreaming is easy!   Anyway, let me introduce you to one of my favorite restaurants in Barcelona: Bun Bo Vietnam. It is a Vietnamise restauran located close [...]

I’ve been away for a while because a lot has been happening in my life. I moved from another city, got married and yesterday I turned 29; all in less than two months. It doesn’t seem like so much when you read it but try going through it; it has been a challenge but I [...]
Not too much to say other than I LOVE strawberries. Have a great weekend everyone!!

In the last few years a new tradition has appeared in Venezuelan parties. It is called the “crazy hour” and it just a time at the party where people get to wear mask and dance to music from different years and style. This mask is from my wedding and my mother was wearing it and [...]

It’s over. 2011 run out of days and left leaving us with 366 precious days to accomplish any goal and dream we have set our mind on. So, let’s start now!   If I had to describe 2011, I would say that it has been a year of changes. My life has changed 180 degrees; [...]

I love Christmas; everyone just seemed to be in a better mood, families get together and you get gifts (can it get better than that?). The photography challenge of this month was, of course, Christmas. I’ve been wanting to experiment with light figures in a picture and with the help of my boyfriend I got [...]
